str:Transformations.str:TransformationScheme: Testing TS <str:Transformation id="TEST_Tr" urn="urn:sdmx:org.sdmx.infomodel.transformation.Transformation=MD:TEST_TS(1.0).TEST_Tr" isPersistent="false"> <com:Name xml:lang="en">Testing Transformation</com:Name> <str:Expression>sum( BIS_LOC_STATS group by REP_COUNTRY,COUNT_SECTOR,REF_DATE)</str:Expression> <str:Result>aggr.agg1</str:Result> </str:Transformation> <str:RulesetScheme> <Ref package="transformation" agencyID="MD" id="TEST_RULESET_SCHEME" version="1.0" class="RulesetScheme"/> </str:RulesetScheme> <str:UserDefinedOperatorScheme> <Ref package="transformation" agencyID="MD" id="TEST_UDO_SCHEME" version="1.0" class="UserDefinedOperatorScheme"/> </str:UserDefinedOperatorScheme>
